game.s_dis: Drill Dozer for GBA is an inventive action-platformer where you control Jill and her mech to drill through enemies, walls, and puzzles across massive, gear-filled stages.
game.l_dis:
Play Drill Dozer GBA Online – Action Platformer by Game Freak

Drill Dozer is a unique 2006 Game Boy Advance platformer developed by Game Freak, best known for the Pokémon series. Players take control of Jill, a fearless mechanic piloting her powerful mech, the Drill Dozer, on a mission to retrieve her stolen Red Diamond from the Skullkers gang.

About Drill Dozer

Unlike traditional platformers, Drill Dozer centers around using Jill’s drill-equipped mech to navigate environments, defeat enemies, and solve puzzles. The drill can spin in both directions using the shoulder buttons, and players can upgrade it from one to three gears, unlocking access to new areas and hidden treasures.

Gameplay Features

  • Innovative Drill Mechanic: Use the drill for combat, movement, and solving environmental puzzles.
  • Upgradable Mech: Find new gears and upgrades to power up your Drill Dozer and revisit earlier levels for secrets.
  • Expansive Levels: Explore 17 detailed stages filled with enemies, traps, and hidden paths.
  • Vibrant Visuals: Features colorful pixel art and dynamic animations from the creators of Pokémon.
  • Rumble Feature: The original cartridge included a built-in rumble motor for tactile feedback during drilling (emulated in modern playthroughs).

How to Play Online

You can play Drill Dozer for free online in your browser. No downloads or setup needed—just start the game and experience this one-of-a-kind platformer directly.

Why Play Drill Dozer?

  • Unique Gameplay: A platformer centered around mechanical puzzles and drilling mechanics.
  • High Replay Value: Return to earlier stages with new upgrades to find collectibles and hidden treasures.
  • Developed by Game Freak: From the creators of Pokémon, offering a fresh take on the platforming genre.

Summary

Drill Dozer stands out as one of the most original and inventive titles on the Game Boy Advance. With its clever mechanics, colorful world, and strong female protagonist, it’s a must-play for fans of action-platformers. Play online and master the art of drilling your way through adventure!
